text: The World Is Not Enough is a 1999 British spy action movie. It was directed by Michael Apted. It is the 19th movie in the James Bond franchise. It stars Pierce Brosnan, Sophie Marceau, Robert Carlyle, Denise Richards, Robbie Coltrane, Judi Dench and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. == Other websites == * * * * * Category:1999 action movies Category:1990s spy movies Category:James Bond movies Category:Movies set in Russia Category:Movies set in Spain Category:Movies set in Istanbul Category:Movies about nuclear war and weapons Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Apted
title: The World Is Not Enough
